entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Surface the _numItems as a public property on DefaultObjectPool #61029
  • Memory leak when using asp-append-version with href pointing to non-existent file #61025
  • Perf regression: fortunes #61024
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes, fortunes #61023
  • [10-preview.2] CS0673 error from XmlCommentGenerator #61019
  • The model is considered nonexistent even when it has been provided to the `EditForm`. #61030
  • Non-standard redirect address for Login #61017
  • [Blazor] `NavigationManager` API consolidation: `NotFound` method => `NotifyNotFound()` + `NotFoundEvent` => `NotFound` #61015
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-generation, json, tls-renegotiation-httpsys #61014
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, single_query #61012
  • PageTitle does not modify document.title inside BlazorWebView #61010
    .NET 10 Planning
  • .Net 9 Blazor MapStaticFiles unusable #61008
    .NET 10 Planning

Closed

  • HttpLoggingMiddleware: Unique ID for Request/Response #48235
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #60995
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #61013
  • No wwwroot created on publish of an ASP.NET with React Project #60652
  • Add AuthN/AuthZ metrics to Semantic conventions for ASP.NET Core metrics #60998
  • Redirect to application endpoint in custom RemoteAuthenticationHandler #61018
  • Exceptions when returning IAsyncEnumerable create invalid ProblemDetails JSON response #60911
  • Declarative model to serialize state on prerendering with Blazor and restore it on the client #26794
    10.0-preview3
  • Blazor Interactive Server Deployed on ACA delivers 404 on websockets #60981
  • Add a Tailwind CSS Template for Blazor in .NET CLI #61002
  • Quarantine `ConnectionCanSendAndReceiveMessages` #60992
  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Transport.NamedPipes.Tests` #60991
  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Sockets` #60990
  • Quarantine `Reset_DuringRequestBody_Resets` - timeouts #60973
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.Tests` #60989
  • AspNetCoreModuleV2: Windows Authentication (IIS, NTLM) not working when TokenImpersonationLevel is "Identification" #54175
    10.0-preview3

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable WOW64, arm64 forwarders in Hosting Bundle #61026
    area-infrastructure
  • Make signing less custom #61022
    area-infrastructure
  • Update tsaoptions.json to include service tree #61021
    area-infrastructure
  • Transitive package to provide coherency in dotnet/extensions #61007
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove unneeded 'fixed' statements from SocketAddress #61006
    area-networking, reduce-unsafe

Merged

  • Fix whitespace in inter-branch-merge.yml #61027
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Fix OpenAPI XML code gen #60977
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview3
  • Pass InnerBuildArgs to inner RepoTasks build in SourceBuild #61020
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • pin gha #60948
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Enable SiteExtensions build in VMR Pass 2 #61004
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Improve flaky tests, move tests blockade. #60930
    test-failure, area-blazor, 10.0-preview4
  • Update branding to preview4 #61009
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Don't build ANCM forwarders in VMR #61000
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Use trim-safe ValidationContext constructor and update RuntimeParameterInfoResolver #60976
    area-minimal, 10.0-preview3
  • Use ImpersonationToken for IIS Windows Auth #58041
    feature-iis, area-networking, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add `AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.RequireClaim` overload that take a `Func<Claim, bool>` #56346
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Fix ResponseCompressionMiddleware tests #60884
    pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-19
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Queue items with continuing discussion #9238

Merged

  • Dictionary expressions: updates and clarifications #9216
  • Collection expressions: inferred element type #8582
  • Document breaking change for proposal discussion Wednesday #9230

Updated

  • Describe scoping rules for extension declaration type parameters and receiver parameter #9229

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to customize table jsonb column name using .ToJson() (owned entity mapping) #35815
  • Exceptions thrown when calling EnsureCreated in debugger when all Break When Thrown is set #35814
  • `ExecuteSql*` methods should allow nullable `object?` parameters #35813

Closed

  • EF core logs `OperationCanceledException` if `CancellationToken` is cancelled before query starts #35708
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Report debug log for connection cancellation #35793

Updated

  • [TEST ONLY] Move AdHocJsonTests to core, so that they also run for Cosmos #35808

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Missing API] BindingContext missing in IView #28526
  • Raise event Always user tap a row in collectionview #28525
  • [CarouselViewHandler2] CurrentItem does not work when PeekAreaInsets is set #28524
  • [CarouselView] Different behavior on iOS and Android when Loop = False #28523
  • [Documentation issue] Page.DisplayAlert wrong documentation (Task vs Task<bool>) #28517
    Backlog
  • Bind ListView.IsRefreshing is not work. #28514
    Backlog
  • .NET 9 project template with sample content has chinese characters instead of icons #28512
    Backlog
  • [Question] .NET 9 MAUI sample app with sample content async lock for DisplayAlert (why?) #28511
    Backlog
  • GroupHeaderTemplate and GroupFooterTemplate Not Displaying in CollectionView(CV2) #28509
    Backlog
  • To build this project, the following workloads must be installed: maui-android #28508
    Backlog
  • Crash on startup with iOS Release #28520
    Backlog
  • Header/Footer Template and View Synchronization Issue in .NET MAUI CollectionView (CV2) #28504
    Backlog
  • Log - Missing Fonts report #28502
    Backlog
  • dotnet publish command for MAUi App (.NET 9) is giving MSB1008 error - Only one folder can be specified #28498
  • [iOS] ShellContent + DataTemplate + Binding => crash #28497
  • [Android] Modal Animation Repeats When Returning from Background #28492

Closed

  • Flickering when transitioning pages in iOS using TabBar menu #28505
    Backlog
  • DisplayAlert / DisplayActionSheet / DisplayPromptAsync inconsistent Async suffix #6720
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] ListView not displaying model property #28503
  • System Theme Inconsistency on iOS 18 when Resuming from Background With Alert (DisplayAlert) #28501
  • Drag & drop between two windows of a single application #12510
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Modal Animation Repeats When Returning from Background - Fix #28522
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-modal
  • [Documentation] Page.DisplayAlert wrong documentation (Task vs Task<bool>) - fix #28521
    area-docs, community ✨
  • [ci] Update arcade net10.0 #28518
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fix Binding for ListView.IsRefreshing #28516
    community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Testing] Move Android UITests to run on Linux #28513
    area-testing
  • Update CommunityToolkit.Maui & Mvvm reference in template #28510
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR6
  • ViewExtensions Async suffix consistency #28506
    t/breaking 💥, area-animation, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Obsolete ListView and Cell types #28500
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-listview, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Windows] Upgrade to Windows App SDK 1.7 #28499
    platform/windows 🪟, area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 8 #28496
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0, Testing] Enabled failed UITests for Switch control due to new OffColor API. #28495
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [iOS] [Android] Fix for the FontImageSource color is not applied properly to the Tab Icon #26757
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.3 to 1.0.4 #28477
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR6
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.3 to 1.0.4 #28478
    area-templates
  • Make DisplayAlert & DisplayActionSheet more consistent by adding Async #28053
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-dialogalert, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [net10.0] Remove api check for Android PutString #28482
    platform/android 🤖, .NET 10.0-preview3

    p/0, area-templates, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Update dotnet-format-daily-main.yml #28488
    community ✨, area-sfi
  • Make GraphicsViewHandler.MapBackground public #28243
    t/breaking 💥, area-drawing, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • [net10.0] Trimmable view handlers #28357
    area-core-hosting
  • [2025/03/18] In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR6
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    area-core-hosting
  • [.NET 10] More public APIs related with Entry and Editor, pending TODOs #28467
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-controls-entry
  • System.MissingMethodException in PropertyPropagationExtensions fix #28456

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cover expression-bodied async methods with generic Task-like return values in implicit object creation analyzer #77670

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35918.206 #77676
  • Unused imports reported during merge conflict resolution #73641
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.d18initial-10418.05 #77667

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch OnAfterPackageLoadedAsync to use a TaskQueue #77687
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove VisualStudioMetadataReferenceManagerFactory #77686
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Upgrade from VSTelemetryApi 17.14.2 to 17.14.8 #77683
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not consider `ref` argument to `in`/`ref readonly` parameter as being written to #77682
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Extensions: definite assignment and region analysis #77675
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Cover expression-bodied async methods with generic Task-like return values in implicit object creation analyzer #77671
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Fix bug where exact path match would throw for additional files #77583
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Cleanup and make semantic token processing and testing code more consistent #77684
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add CI validation of Semantic Search API lists #77535
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Support textDocument/semanticTokens/full #77665
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add RuntimeAsyncMethodGenerationAttribute #77543
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev18.0' #77680
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77681
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix SkipApplyOptimizationData parameter #77677
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77679
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Extensions: Adjust accessibility and file-type checks for extension members #77657
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Fix typo #77678
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev18.0' #77674
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77673
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix reflection use in integration tests #77669
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev18.0' #77668
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77666
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extensions: update semantic model APIs #77619
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace to a background thread. #77654
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add more modern-extension FAR tests #77503
    Area-IDE, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Remove old options related to solution crawler #77625
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Change keys for import caching #77627
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add feature to convert classic extension methods to the new 'extension' form in C# 14. #77660
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Avoid adding duplicate suppressors to the host analyzer arrays #77062
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow modification of source generated documents #77587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Update maintenance-packages dependencies #77267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • More refined categorization of tracing events? #113717
  • Unsafe.As not working properly with the Half data type. #113716
  • Tests failing to run in internal release branches #113710
  • build.cmd clr -msbuild fails #113708
  • Codesigning the apphost on macOS should preserve entitlements #113707
  • Support Socket.DuplicateAndClose through pidfd_getfd on Linux #113701
  • AIJsonUtilities.CreateJsonSchema does not support complex objects with nested references #113698
    Future
  • [wasm coreclr] exception handling #113694
  • [wasm coreclr] gc #113693
    Future
  • [wasm coreclr] pinvoke and intenal calls #113692
    Future
  • HttpWebRequest.AddRange generates incorrect header if called twice #113690
    10.0.0
  • AssemblyLoadContext never gets unloaded when a type is used in expression trees. #113687
  • [Long Running Test] 'System.Composition.UnitTests.ConcurrencyTests.SharedInstancesAreNotVisibleUntilActivationCompletes' #113686
  • System.Text.Json float and double outside their boundaries do not throw exception #113680

Closed

  • Unhandled exception from AcceptCompletionCallback #108026
    10.0.0
  • NativeAOT runtime crash with source-generated serialization ('Failed to create generic virtual method implementation') #113664
  • dotnet core 3.1 __pv_queued_spin_lock_slowpath #34678
  • someone PR to SQlitePCL.raw repo to support `linux-bionic-arm64` target #113691
  • SslStreamTlsResumeTests.ClientDisableTlsResume_Succeeds failed in CI #103449
    10.0.0
  • Build failure in browser-wasm #113685
  • `Cookie.GetHashCode()` does not ignore leading dot in Domain #112602
    10.0.0
  • CookieContainer doesn't replace Cookie with same name #84820
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Expose span on SpanSplitEnumerator #109874
    Future
  • Incorrect version of System.Resources.Extensions.dll / incorrectly generated binding redirect for System.Resources.Extensions #113683
    9.0.x
  • System.Security.Cryptography.DES.CreateDecryptor() crash on android #113149
  • QuicConnection.ConnectAsync() connection failure causes memory leak. #113030
  • [mono-runtime] "unknown option: -verbose" on mono based archs while running xunit console runner validating System.IO.Tests #113642
  • Recommend updating to msquic 2.4.8 #113136
    8.0.x
  • [JIT] Elide bounds check for reverse iteration over arrays and spans #9505
    Future
  • Elide bounds checks for partial array/span iteration #31638
    Future
  • Process not responsive dump indicates garbage collection #110350
    10.0.0
  • Add GitHub Container Image for dotnet #41722
  • Incorrect Base Offset for Dublin Timezone - Discrepancy Between Server and Local Machine #112650

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove GC Poll calls in FCalls. #113715
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Trigger superpmi-replay pipeline if LSRA files change #113714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Draft : Reduce TP by handling liveRegs separately #113713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Passthorugh publishing and sourcelink from the outer build #113712
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: revise escape analysis bit vector usage #113711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Graph-based loop inversion #113709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILLink: Respect DisableRuntimeMarshalling #113706
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Doc comment improvements (mostly System.Formats.Nrbf) #113705
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • ILLink: Stop giving special treatment to icalls #113704
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [mono] Add a few bridge tests #113703
    area-GC-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #113702
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Do not report inlining decision to runtime in DEBUG mode #113700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Json] Avoid writing to PipeWriter if IAsyncEnumerable throws before first item #113699
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Tensor<T> select. Iteration along dimensions #113697
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] memory pressure for MSBuild #113696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Simple math intrinsics #113689

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Swift language features] Revisit thread safety of ref counting in projections #2975
  • [Projection tooling] Add symbols from dynamic library to type database #2918
  • [Projection tooling] Implement Demangler query methods #2665

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Shipping] Test StoreKit bindings on MacCatalyst #3040
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift Bindings] Project value types with heap-allocated properties as C# classes #3038
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge feb25 #2993

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error after upgrading to 8.0.114 on ubuntu 24.04 #47735
  • `dotnet test` for MTP doesn't correctly work with retry extension #47725
    10.0.1xx

Closed

  • Discuss the handling of `RunSettingsFilePath` in new dotnet test experience #47636

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow winforms binaries in the VMR #47745

  • Improve Post-Build Signing Validation in the VMR #47744

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Optimize compression #47734
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add test for MTP Retry feature #47727
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .net10 p2 to p3 in the table #47724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use CDN Fixes #47503 #47712

Merged

  • Fix scenario-tests not uploading results to AzDO #47737

  • Improve baselining #47700

  • Update prerelease branding for preview 4 #47709

  • Bump versions for test templates #47688

  • .NET Source-Build 10.0.100-preview.2.25164.1 March 2025 Updates #47699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix runtimeIdentifier for macOS PR jobs #47733
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add cgmanifest.json for test templates #47652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove RunSettingsFilePath support from dotnet test for MTP #47706

  • Remove no longer used TestOptions.Configuration #47703

  • dotnet package list should not throw if project not specified #47402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove primary vertical concept from JoinVerticals #47338

Updated

  • simplify CreateTempSubdirectory #45633

  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid using AssetDetails, but FileLength and LastWriteTime directly on StaticWebAsset #47695
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
